summary: Although the home of cabinet minister Arthur Bennett is a hotbed of spies, moles, and double agents, no one knows the true identity of notorious German spymaster Strendler.
cast: Boris Karloff|Margaret Lindsay|Bruce Lester|Leonard Mudie|Holmes Herbert|Austin Fairman|William Bailey|Louise Brien|Glen Cavender|David Cavendish|Joe De Stefani|Carlos De Valdez|Clarence Derwent|Arno Frey|Frederick Giermann|Lawrence Grant|Carl Harbaugh|Sam Harris|Winifred Harris|Leyland Hodgson|Stuart Holmes|Willy Kaufman|Crauford Kent|Morton Lowry|Lester Matthews|Frank Mayo|Paul Panzer|John J. Richardson|Ferdinand Schumann-Heink|Hans Schumm|John Graham Spacey|Robert R. Stephenson|Evan Thomas|David Thursby|Frederick Vogeding|Leonard Willey|Maris Wrixon|Henry Zynda
keywords: double agent|counter spy|world war one|german spy|time bomb
director: Director: Terry O. Morse (as Terry Morse)
title: British Intelligence
